column2: Chiisana Koi no Monogatari: Chichi to Sally Hatsukoi no Shiki

Tiny schoolgirl Chiiko develops a crush on older boy Sally and believes herself to be his girlfriend, although Sally is already involved in a love triangle with a girl called Tonko.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)
[['Yamada, Etsuji', 'Sound Director'], ['Tominaga, Tsuneo', 'Episode Director'], ['Shibuichi, Setsuko', 'Storyboard, Animation Director'], ['Kisugi, Takao', 'Theme Song Composition']]
